result.title: Question about Test 20 in Round #363 (Div. 2) Problem B. One Bomb
result.content: I don't really understand the test case. The test case says that it 1000 rows and 1 column. all rows are empty (i.e â€” ".") and the last line contains ("...."). From what I understand from the problem description, this is supposed to a "NO" because there are no walls. But the Jury answer is YES and is saying that the location to set the bomb is in (1, 1). How is that possible?
